marklogic.body: Â Of course. Wouldn't want to give the law and court system a chance to work. How come these protesters never come to Detroit to march and protest about the black on black crime? Burning bitcchh'es and tossing em in cars and shooting keed's over the stupidest of things?????? Helll, in d-town folks run each other over and just drive Off on a weekly basis. No, big thing.........But a Mexican with a white daddy shoots somebody, and they acked like its never happened ever before......... All these protesters need to get back on the busses they rode in on and get back to there own neighborhoods and start cleaning up their own backyards first.
